nav.div: Spencerport Central School District » District » Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) » Community Food Pantries_Health Insurance Resources

strong.span: New! Drive-thru food distributions offered by Monroe County and Foodlink

. Pre-registration is required. Please find the details within these flyers:
Foodlink distribution flyer
Foodlink distribution flyer (Spanish)

span.strong: Thank you to the Family Support Center for compiling the resources below.

span.br:
Call 585-397-0290
Spencerport Food Shelf provides emergency food to anyone in the Spencerport Central School District.
How to help:
Collection sites to donate to the Spencerport Food Shelf:
The Spencerport Food Shelf has several sites designated for the donation of non-perishable food and items. Locations, drop-off times, and any instructions where applicable:
* Café Macchiato, 123 Union St, 8 a.m.- 5 p.m., daily, inside the shop
* Ogden Baptist Church, 721 Washington St, 11 a.m.-1 p.m, Tue. & Thurs, Curbside outside the office doors on the westside of the building; or call 810-333-3298 if no one is there.
* Spencerport United Methodist, 39 Amity St., Collection basket outside of church
* St. John's, 55 Martha St., 9 a.m. - 5 p.m., daily

span.strong: nroe County Area Food Cupboards Guide

img.title: foodlink logo
img.br: Food cupboards help meet emergency food needs. Each cupboard operates as a neighborhood volunteer unit covering a specific area and receives support from its local churches and funders.

p.span:
Contact 211 to get the daily Foodlink Mobile Pantry and Curbside Market Location.
To donate to the #SpencerportTogether Dinner Subsidy program, please click this link.

a.title: A hyperlink to Healthy NY Health Insurance Application Form
A hyperlink to Healthy NY Health Insurance Application Form

div.span:
Coordinated Care Services, Inc (CCSI):
Call 585-613-7662
CCSI provides assistance to families at various locations throughout the county to navigate, educate, and enroll in health insurance plans.

p.span: Navigator Agency Site Locations (scroll down to find Monroe County)

em.span: The Family Support Center does not endorse any organizations or individuals outside of the Spencerport Central School District. These resources are for informational purposes and should be pursued based on the consumer's own criteria.

div.div:
71 Lyell Ave., Spencerport, NY 14559
Phone 585-349-5000 | Fax 585-349-5011
